pages.text: Extreme Reactor energy generators are, by design, not tied to any particular power system that exist today in the world of Minecraft.$(br2)Energy is generated and then converted on the fly by the Power Taps when it is extracted from the internal energy buffer.

The Power Taps installed in your Reactor or Turbine define the output energy system of the machine.$(br2)Currently the mod come with a $(l:bigreactors:reactor/part-forgepowertap)Forge Energy Power Tap$(/l) that send out $(bold)Forge Energy$() units.$(br2)Other power system can be supported by adding new types of Power Taps easily.
